metadata.title: CVE-2024-24858 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth in{conn,adv}_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in I2capconnection or broadcast abnormality issue, possibly leading to denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24858` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-116-generic - 5.15.0-116.126
